summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Disco Scientia Corporation for the period of August 1, 2017, to August 31, 2017. It details the account balance, service charges, and criteria for waiving those charges.

persons.name: Cesar Taverns
persons.context: Cesar Taverns is identified as the Relationship Manager for the account at Fifth Third Bank.

keyFacts: The account belongs to Disco Scientia Corporation.
The statement period is from August 1, 2017, to August 31, 2017.
The ending balance for the account on August 31, 2017, is $231.26.
The standard monthly service charge was waived due to not meeting the balance criteria.
The document includes an introductory offer for business checks from Harland Clarke.
